amendment.description: To provide additional funding for the ombudsman program for the protection of vulnerable older Americans.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1558 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1558 proposed by Senator Kohl to Amendment SA 1542. (consideration: CR S11056-11057; text: CR S11056) To provide additional funding for the ombudsman program for the protection of vulnerable older Americans.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1558 as modified agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1558 proposed by Senator Kohl to Amendment SA 1542.
